title: Master of science - University of Jyväskylä
summary: Graduated from JYU with a master's degree in information technology and computer science. My studies included courses related to software development, programming, system architectures, IoT, data science and some machine learning. I wrote my thesis to my employer Akamon Innovations where the subject was 'Error monitoring in a distributed cloud-based system'. In the thesis I created a framework and an IAC tool for creating monitoring resources to a given service. Read more about my final years with the button below.

title: Erasmus student exchange - University of Twente
summary: I did a half a year student exchange at the University of Twente in the Netherlands. I studied courses related to programming principles, patterns and processes, software development, data science and blockchain and distributed ledger technologies. Of course the exchange period also gave me a lot of experience with working and communicating entirely in english with different people from different backgrounds. I also made a lof of new friends and got to know the culture of the Netherlands. I also had a chance to travel a bit in the country and visit some other countries in Europe. Click 'Read more' to read more about my exchange period.

title: Bachelor of science - University of Jyväskylä
summary: I graduated from JYU with a bachelor's degree in information technology and computer science and a minor in mathematics. My studies included courses related to software development, programming, IoT, data science and some machine learning. I wrote my bachelor's thesis about using smart assistants for controlling smart homes. I was also very active in my student association Linkki JKL ry, where I was a member of the board in 2022 as secretary and spokesperson and in 2023 I was the project leader for student event Jyväsmetro and editor-in-chief for the student association magazine 'A href'. Read more about my studies and student life with the button below.
